name: Third-i bvba
membership: www.scie.eu - Responsible for driving Policy Impact Workstream
goal:
About Third-i www.third-i.eu

Founded in 2013 by Jacqueline Bowman-Busato, Third-i is a Brussels- based SME with a presence in London operating under the ethos of Shared Value.

Specialising in healthcare policy and innovation-driven initiatives, the team builds alliances, sets agendas, and leads the development of actionable strategies and implementation to answer today’s complex healthcare challenges.

A trusted member of the healthcare and innovation communities at European, national and global actors level, Third-i team members have worked extensively in the field of Person centred care from a systems thinking and participatory stakeholder engagement perspective.

We champion five main areas which we believe will lead to our vision of Person-centred health ecosystems:
o Patient engagement
o Value of Innovation
o Mainstreaming mental health
o Self-Care and wellbeing
o Women’s empowerment (maternal health and other women’s health issues)

We have developed a system for internal buy-in and capacity building on the one hand and meaningful multi-stakeholder engagement across the healthcare ecosystem from policy to practice.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: Self Care, Health Systems Performance Assessment (HSPA), Sexual & Reproductive Health and Rights (SRHR), Obesity
